statements: UPDATE student_reports SET performance_score = 85.5, attendance_status = 'Present' WHERE student_id = 123
UPDATE student_reports SET progress_status = 'Good', student_name = 'Alice' WHERE student_id = 456
UPDATE student_reports SET attendance_status = 'Present', progress_status = 'Good' WHERE student_id = 101
UPDATE student_reports SET performance_score = 85.7, student_name = 'Alice' WHERE student_id = 102
UPDATE student_performance SET performance_score = 90.5, assessment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE student_id = 123
UPDATE student_attendance SET attendance_status = TRUE, date = '2022-10-15' WHERE student_id = 456
UPDATE student_performance SET performance_score = 85.5, assessment_date = '2022-05-15', test_type = 'Midterm' WHERE student_id = 101;
UPDATE student_attendance SET attendance_status = TRUE WHERE student_id = 102 AND date = '2022-05-20';
UPDATE student_performance SET grade = 80 WHERE student_id = 1234;
UPDATE student_attendance SET status = 'Present' WHERE student_id = 5678;
UPDATE student_performance SET grade = 90, teacher = 'Mr. Smith' WHERE student_id = 101;
UPDATE student_attendance SET status = 'Present' WHERE student_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-05';
UPDATE Student SET age = 20, first_name = 'Alice' WHERE student_id = 101;
UPDATE Performance SET test_score = 95, test_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE student_id = 102;
UPDATE Student SET age = 25, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id = 12345;
UPDATE Attendance SET status = 'Present' WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND student_id = 12345;
UPDATE Student SET student_name='Alice', student_grade='A' WHERE student_id=1;
UPDATE Attendance SET status='Present' WHERE student_id=2 AND attendance_date='2022-01-10';
UPDATE Student SET student_grade='B' WHERE student_id=101;
UPDATE Reports SET report_type='Midterm' WHERE student_id=102;
